verses.verse: בְּיָמָ֣יו <S%H3117><s%> be-ya-Mav In his days עָלָ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah, came up נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּ֖ר <S%H5019><s%> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel; of Babylon וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- became ל֨וֹ lo יְהוֹיָקִ֥ים <S%H3079><s%> ye-ho-ya-Kim and Jehoiakim עֶ֙בֶד֙ <S%H5650><s%> 'e-ved became his servant שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Losh three שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim, years וַיָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov then he turned וַיִּמְרָד־ <S%H4775><s%> vai-yim-rod- and rebelled בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

וַיְשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> vay-shal-Lach sent יְהוָ֣ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD בּ֡וֹ bo אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּדוּדֵ֣י <S%H1416><s%> ge-du-Dei against him bands כַשְׂדִּים֩ <S%H3778><s%> chas-Dim of the Chaldees וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et גְּדוּדֵ֨י <S%H1416><s%> ge-du-Dei and bands אֲרָ֜ם <S%H758><s%> 'a-Ram of the Syrians וְאֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et גְּדוּדֵ֣י <S%H1416><s%> ge-du-Dei and bands מוֹאָ֗ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of the Moabites וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et גְּדוּדֵ֣י <S%H1416><s%> ge-du-Dei and bands בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon, of Ammon וַיְשַׁלְּחֵ֥ם <S%H7971><s%> vay-shal-le-Chem and sent בִּֽיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> bi-hu-Dah them against Judah לְהַֽאֲבִיד֑וֹ <S%H6><s%> le-ha-'a-vi-Do; to destroy כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> kid-Var it according to the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber, which he spake בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad by עֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav his servants הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im. the prophets

אַ֣ךְ׀ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Surely עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- at פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> pi Surely at the commandment יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah came בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> bi-hu-Dah, came [this] upon Judah לְהָסִ֖יר <S%H5493><s%> le-ha-Sir to remove מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from פָּנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav; [them] out of his sight בְּחַטֹּ֣את <S%H2403><s%> be-chat-Tot for the sins מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh כְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah. according to all that he did

וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and also דַּֽם־ <S%H1818><s%> dam- blood הַנָּקִי֙ <S%H5355><s%> han-na-Ki And also for the innocent אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which שָׁפָ֔ךְ <S%H8210><s%> sha-Fach, that he shed וַיְמַלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> vay-mal-Le for he filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> dam blood נָקִ֑י <S%H5355><s%> na-Ki; with innocent וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not אָבָ֥ה <S%H14><s%> 'a-Vah would יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לִסְלֹֽחַ׃ <S%H5545><s%> lis-Lo-ach. not pardon

וְיֶ֛תֶר <S%H3499><s%> ve-Ye-ter Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei of the acts יְהוֹיָקִ֖ים <S%H3079><s%> ye-ho-ya-Kim of Jehoiakim וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; and all that he did הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lo- not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> hem like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> ke-tu-Vim, [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> le-mal-Chei of the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. Judah

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav slept יְהוֹיָקִ֖ים <S%H3079><s%> ye-ho-ya-Kim So Jehoiakim עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֲבֹתָ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav; with his fathers וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yim-Loch reigned יְהוֹיָכִ֥ין <S%H3078><s%> ye-ho-ya-Chin and Jehoiachin בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav. his place

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not הֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> ho-Sif not again עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od again מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech And the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לָצֵ֖את <S%H3318><s%> la-Tzet came מֵֽאַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> me-'ar-Tzo; any more out of his land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for לָקַ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach had taken מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech for the king בָּבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel, of Babylon מִנַּ֤חַל <S%H5158><s%> min-Na-chal from the river מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> ne-har- unto the river פְּרָ֔ת <S%H6578><s%> pe-Rat, Euphrates כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah belonged לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech all that pertained to the king מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt פ Peh

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שְׁמֹנֶ֨ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh eight עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years יְהוֹיָכִ֣ין <S%H3078><s%> ye-ho-ya-Chin Jehoiachin בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> be-ma-le-Cho, when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> u-she-lo-Shah three חֳדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2320><s%> cho-da-Shim, months מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo, And his mother's נְחֻשְׁתָּ֥א <S%H5179><s%> ne-chush-Ta [was] Nehushta בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> vat- the daughter אֶלְנָתָ֖ן <S%H494><s%> 'el-na-Tan of Elnathan מִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> mi-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah had done אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv. according to all that his father

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et At that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi, he; עָלָה 'a-lah כעָל֗וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu, arise קעַבְדֵ֛י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei the servants נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar of Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; against Jerusalem וַתָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo came הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir and the city בַּמָּצֽוֹר׃ <S%H4692><s%> bam-ma-Tzor. siege

וַיָּבֹ֛א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar And Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir; against the city וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> va-'a-va-Dav and his servants צָרִ֥ים <S%H6696><s%> tza-Rim did besiege עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha. and

וַיֵּצֵ֞א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went out יְהוֹיָכִ֤ין <S%H3078><s%> ye-ho-ya-Chin And Jehoiachin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech to the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel, of Babylon ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְאִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-Mo, he and his mother וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> va-'a-va-Dav and his servants וְשָׂרָ֣יו <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Rav and his princes וְסָֽרִיסָ֑יו <S%H5631><s%> ve-sa-ri-Sav; and his officers וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech and the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel, of Babylon בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh him in the eighth לְמָלְכֽוֹ׃ <S%H4427><s%> le-ma-le-Cho. of his reign

וַיּוֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-Tze And he carried out מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham, there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אוֹצְרוֹת֙ <S%H214><s%> 'otz-rOt thence all the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְאֽוֹצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> ve-'otz-Rot and the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; of the king's וַיְקַצֵּ֞ץ <S%H7112><s%> vay-katz-Tzetz and cut in pieces אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lei all the vessels הַזָּהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav, of gold אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah had made שְׁלֹמֹ֤ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh which Solomon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> be-hei-Chal in the temple יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber had said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. as the LORD

וְהִגְלָ֣ה <S%H1540><s%> ve-hig-Lah And he carried away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יְ֠רוּשָׁלִַם <S%H3389><s%> Ye-ru-sha-lim all Jerusalem וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all הַשָּׂרִ֞ים <S%H8269><s%> has-sa-Rim and all the princes וְאֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <S%H1368><s%> gib-bo-Rei and all the mighty men הַחַ֗יִל <S%H2428><s%> ha-Cha-yil, of valour; עֲשָׂרָה 'a-sa-rah כעֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret ten קאֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand גּוֹלֶ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> go-Leh, captive וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הֶחָרָ֖שׁ <S%H2796><s%> he-cha-Rash and all the craftsmen וְהַמַּסְגֵּ֑ר <S%H4525><s%> ve-ham-mas-Ger; and smiths לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo None נִשְׁאַ֔ר <S%H7604><s%> nish-'Ar, none remained זוּלַ֖ת <S%H2108><s%> zu-Lat save דַּלַּ֥ת <S%H1803><s%> dal-Lat the poorest sort עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- of the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the land
